column5: Sup ya'll,  I haven't been around here much lately, and haven't pm'd many of you guys whom I consider to be friends.  The reason being is that I took on a large editing project (on top of my full time job) that's going to keep be busy for a long time.  I just wanted to say that OFC rules, and that I still pop in whenever I have a free moment.  Keep on posting and Good Fishin' all!  UF
Thanks fishergirl, i'm actually working on a fishing show so it's even that much more fun! Makes it hard to go to my main job now! haha  cheers!
